name: Orange Technolab
description: Wondering why we named ourselves after this citrusy, Vitamin-C filled fruit? Well, the main reason is that “Orange”, the color is associated with joy and creativity. And our services and expertise are synonymous to that. An award-winning Software Development Company, committed to providing end-to-end IT services in Web, Mobile & Cloud development, UI/UX design, and development to Software deployment since inception
features: Creating a conducive and professional workspace
Variety of Website design and development service
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Your guide to ERP implimentation.

Highlights.name: On Demand Solution
Highlights.description: It takes immense relevant expertise to serve end-users on demand.

Highlights.name: Ecommerce Development
Highlights.description: Our e-commerce website services ensure the use of latest technologies.

Highlights.name: Resources as a Service
Highlights.description: The Resource-as-a-Service (RaaS) cloud is an economic model of cloud computing.

enhanced_description: Orange Technolab is an award-winning Software Development Company committed to providing end-to-end IT services. Their expertise spans Web, Mobile, and Cloud development, UI/UX design, and software deployment. They also serve as a guide for ERP implementation and specialize in developing Training eLearning software and e-commerce solutions. Offering 'Resources as a Service' (RaaS) and on-demand solutions, Orange Technolab aims to redefine software development creatively while also addressing capabilities for remote working options and creating conducive professional workspaces.
key_use_cases: Development of Training and eLearning software
Provision of IT resources as a service (RaaS)
Enabling and optimizing remote working environments
competitive_advantages: Utilizes Resources as a Service (RaaS) economic model
hr_functions_supported: Learning & Development (via eLearning software and skill development focus)
Workplace Experience (creating conducive workspaces, supporting remote work)
Workforce Planning (potentially through 'Resources as a Service' for flexible IT staffing)
roi_benefits: Economic efficiency through cloud computing models (RaaS)
scalability_features: Scalable solutions (implied by 'On Demand Solution', 'Resources as a Service', and target company sizes)
